creditline: Gift of Charles H. Bell, J. Ford Bell, and Samuel H. Bell
markings:
Marks

Fully marked on foot of uppermost basket and on bezel encircling it.  Maker's mark, sovereign's head, and lion passant on foot of bowls and small baskets.  Maker's mark and lion passant on handle of baskets and on scrolled arms supporting them.  Lion passant on one of the arms supporting the bowls.
title: Epergne
